content: {"name": "The Prodigal Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Might be closed when they have no food to give out and unfortunately this is spread via word of mouth\n- ", "email": "", "url": "theprodigalcenter.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "709 Tiffany St", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10474", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.814194, "longitude": -73.891403}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 644-8523", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "1 bag per family/person"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
